description:
100% Open Source Toolkit for Large Language Models: Train, Tune, Chat on your own Machine

Transformer Lab is a free, open-source LLM workspace that you can run on your own computer. It is designed to go beyond what most modern open LLM applications allow. Using Transformer Lab you can easily finetune, evaluate, export and test LLMs across different inference engines and platforms.
What's Changed
- Fix undefined error id screen upon losing connection to API by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/772
- Fix Output Terminal going blank when re-connecting to another API server by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/775
- Model groups search bar now looks at more things than just model groups name by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/770
- Add no model is running pop-up upon model disconnection to audio screen by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/778
- This fix removes the duplication of native + wavesurfer audio playersâ€¦ by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/776
- Add Top P field for audio by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/777
- Fix/audio cloning upload by @mina-parham in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/781
- Dont show nan in text if another model is deleted while downloading by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/784
Full Changelog: https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/compare/v0.23.0...v0.23.1
